translation.zh: 向我深深在乎且尊重的人的一生致敬

translation.zh: 你通常问病人的第一个问题是什么？

translation.zh: 问的第一件事是“你想要什么？来这里是为了什么？”

translation.zh: 一般的精神科医师会说“不要干涉病人的过程

translation.en: "They will come up with the answers when they're ready."
translation.zh: 等他们准备好了 自然会有答案”

translation.en: That sucks. That's not acceptable.
translation.zh: 烂透了 那是不可接受的

translation.zh: 我入这行的时候精神科治疗强调的是医师的中立

translation.zh: “我只是个旁观者我的个人利益不受影响”

translation.zh: 治疗过程是非常缓慢的病人们受尽折磨

translation.zh: 你懂我的 我的反应就是

translation.en: "Then go fuck yourself. Are you kidding me?"
translation.zh: “那去死吧 你跟我开玩笑呢？”

translation.en: If I'm dealing with someone with depression like that, who's afraid won't recover,
translation.zh: 如果我面对的是害怕自己好不起来的抑郁症患者

translation.en: I say, "Do what the fuck I tell you. Do exactly what I tell you."
translation.zh: 那我会说“完全按照我他妈说的去做”

translation.en: "I guarantee you'll feel better. Guarantee, 100%. It's on me."
translation.zh: “我保证你会感觉好点我百分之百保证”

translation.en: [Jonah] When I walked into your office, we sat down,
translation.zh: 当我走进你的办公室的时候我们坐下来

translation.en: and you were just like, "Here's what you should do."
translation.zh: 你就告诉我“你应该这么做”

translation.en: You gave me some form of action. You gave me a tool.
translation.zh: 你给了我可以采取的行动你给了我一个工具

translation.en: Yeah, it's… it's imperative.
translation.zh: 对 这是必须的

translation.en: I wanted speed in this.
translation.zh: 我想要速度

translation.en: Not speed to cure somebody in a week. That's impossible.
translation.zh: 不是在一周内把人治好的速度那是不可能的

translation.en: But I wanted them to feel some change,
translation.zh: 而是想让患者感受到一些变化

translation.en: some forward motion.
translation.zh: 一些前进的动力

translation.en: It gives them hope. It's like, "Oh, shit, that's actually possible."
translation.zh: 这给予他们希望让他们知道这实际上是可能的

translation.en: So what are the tools?
translation.zh: 那么 什么是工具？

translation.en: A tool is something that can change your state, your inner state,
translation.zh: 工具是能够立即实时地改变

translation.en: immediately, in real time.
translation.zh: 你的内在状态的东西

translation.en: It takes an experience that's normally unpleasant,
translation.zh: 它把通常为不愉快的经历

translation.en: then it turns it into an opportunity.
translation.zh: 转化为机会

translation.en: Tools change your mood
translation.zh: 工具改变你的情绪

translation.en: and then just give you a sense of hope that that won't be your mood forever.
translation.zh: 并且让你看到自己的情绪不会一直糟下去的希望

translation.en: [Stutz] That's correct.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: [Jonah] It's basically a real-time visualization exercise
translation.zh: 基本上就是你在那一刻 在脑海里进行的一种实时可视化练习

translation.en: you do in your head at that moment.
translation.zh: 在脑海里进行的一种实时可视化练习

translation.en: Yeah. So in that sense, I'm a teacher.
translation.zh: 对 从这个意义上说 我是个老师

translation.en: I'm teaching the person how to use it and also teach them when to do it.
translation.zh: 我教病人如何使用它也教他们什么时候使用它

translation.en: All of your patients, myself included, we have all these note cards.
translation.zh: 你所有的病人 包括我自己在内都有这些笔记卡

translation.en: [Jonah] And they're drawings of the tools that you do in our sessions
translation.zh: 你在笔记卡上画了我们在治疗中所用到的工具

translation.en: that we take home and keep.
translation.zh: 让我们带回家去

translation.en: [Stutz] I tend to think in visual terms.
translation.zh: 我倾向于从视觉角度进行思考

translation.en: So I started drawing these cards really for myself,
translation.zh: 所以便开始画这些卡片纯粹是为了自己

translation.en: but it helped the patients tremendously.
translation.zh: 但它们给病人带来了极大的帮助

translation.en: The power of the cards is that they turn big ideas into simple images.
translation.zh: 卡片的力量在于它们把宏大的想法转化为简单的图像

translation.en: It was a way of communicating with the patient
translation.zh: 这是一种与病人沟通的方式

translation.en: that I actually felt was more powerful than using words.
translation.zh: 我觉得这种方式比语言更有力

translation.en: The moment they take out the card,
translation.zh: 病人拿出卡片的那一刻

translation.en: there's a connection between the two of us. There's a bond.
translation.zh: 我和他之间就有了联系 有了纽带

translation.en: Yeah, we have a uniquely personal relationship.
translation.zh: 对 我俩有一种独特的个人关系

translation.en: So much so that you're letting me make a film about you.
translation.zh: 独特到你愿意让我拍一部关于你的电影

translation.en: That is something I've never experienced in the therapeutic world.
translation.zh: 这是我在治疗界从未经历过的事情

translation.en: And, ultimately, my life has gotten immeasurably better as a result of working with you,
translation.zh: 最终我的生活因为有你的帮助而得到了巨大的改善

translation.en: and so, if it worked for me, maybe it will work for other people.
translation.zh: 所以 如果对我有效也许对其他人也会有效

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Time for medicine.
translation.zh: 对了 到时间吃药了

translation.zh: -到时间做什么？-到时间吃药了

translation.zh: -哦 谢谢-闹钟响了

translation.zh: 乔纳 要不要和我一起嗑点帕金森病的药？

translation.zh: 我多年前就戒掉那玩意儿了

translation.zh: 你知道吗？我年轻时也嗑过药

translation.en: if you ever told me, "50 years hence you'd be taking all this medicine…"
translation.zh: 如果那时候你告诉我50年后的我得吃这么多药…

translation.en: So that's all medicine for your Parkinson's?
translation.zh: 所以这些都是治疗你的帕金森病的药？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.zh: 得了帕金森病的最大问题在于

translation.en: you have to preplan a lot of little things.
translation.zh: 很多小事情你都必须预先计划好但这也有好处

translation.en: When I have to get out of bed,
translation.zh: 当我要下床的时候

translation.en: I have to go through contortions to get out of the bed.
translation.zh: 身体必须经过一番扭曲才能下床

translation.en: The hardest thing for me in life is getting out of bed in the morning.
translation.zh: 对我来说人生中最困难的事莫过于早上起床

translation.en: -But for very different reasons. -For different… [chuckles] Yeah.
translation.zh: -但原因截然不同-不同 对 是啊

translation.en: So, before meeting you, my experience with therapy was very traditional
translation.zh: 在遇见你之前我的治疗经历都是非常传统的

translation.en: in the sense of I would be talking
translation.zh: 就是我在倾诉

translation.en: and the person would say, "How does that feel?" -Or, "Interesting." [laughs] -[Stutz] Right.
translation.zh: 然后对方会说“这让你有何感受？”或者“有意思”

translation.en: Basically keeping me at a massive distance.
translation.zh: 基本上与我保持着巨大的距离

translation.en: Yeah. [Jonah] And I was thinking about how, in traditional therapy,
translation.zh: 我就在想 在传统的治疗中

translation.en: you're paying this person, and you save all of your problems for them,
translation.zh: 你付钱给这个人然后把问题都扔给他们

translation.en: and they just listen,
translation.zh: 他们就只管倾听

translation.en: and your friends, who are idiots,
translation.zh: 而你的白痴朋友们

translation.en: give you advice.
translation.zh: -却给你建议-是

translation.en: -[Stutz] Yes. -Unsolicited.
translation.zh: -不请自来的建议-是

translation.en: -[Stutz] Yes. -And you want your friends just to listen.
translation.zh: -不请自来的建议-是 可你只希望你的朋友们能倾听

translation.en: And you want your therapist to give you advice.
translation.zh: 而你希望你的医师能给你建议

translation.en: Here's the thing. The shrinks, it's not that they don't want to help you.
translation.zh: 事情是这样的医师们并不是不想帮你

translation.en: It's really not.
translation.zh: 真的不是

translation.en: But for me, I always felt there was something missing.
translation.zh: 但对我来说 我总觉得还缺了点什么

translation.en: So a tool is a bridge
translation.zh: 所以工具是一座桥梁

translation.en: between what you realize the problem is and the cause of the problem
translation.zh: 把你从意识到问题是什么以及问题背后的原因

translation.en: to over here,
translation.zh: 带到这里

translation.en: actually gaining at least some control over the symptom.
translation.zh: 对症状至少有一定程度的控制

translation.en: It all has to do with possibility.
translation.zh: 这一切都与可能性有关

translation.en: And not a bullshit definition of possibility.
translation.zh: 不是什么狗屁定义的可能性

translation.en: Possibility means you feel yourself reacting differently.
translation.zh: 可能性意味着你感觉到自己的反应不一样了

translation.en: It sounds, um…
translation.zh: 这听起来…

translation.en: What do you call it? Trite. But it's actually the truth.
translation.zh: 怎么说来着？听起来很陈腐 但这是事实

translation.en: [Jonah] One of the first things you got me working on was my life force.
translation.zh: 你首先让我做的事是提升自己的生命力

translation.en: That was such an immediate thing that can change your life
translation.zh: 那是可以直接改变你的生活的工具

translation.en: and something that I think anyone can easily latch onto.
translation.zh: 而且我觉得任何人都可以轻松掌握

translation.en: And it was the first step for me in beginning the process of getting better.
translation.zh: 提升生命力是我迈向疗愈的第一步

translation.en: Yeah, that's correct. Here's the classic thing that happens.
translation.zh: 没错 典型的情况是这样的

translation.en: A guy's depressed, he comes into my office, and he says,
translation.zh: 一个很抑郁的病人来到我的办公室他告诉我

translation.en: "I know my habits are shit." "I… I… I know I'm undisciplined. I know I'm lazy."
translation.zh: “我知道我有很多坏习惯我知道我没纪律 我知道我很懒

translation.en: "But if I only knew what I was supposed to be doing,
translation.zh: 但要是我知道我应该做些什么

translation.en: what my mission was in life, essentially, I'd be like I was shot out of a gun."
translation.zh: 我的人生使命是什么 那我肯定会干劲满满

translation.en: "But I don't know what I'm supposed to be doing,
translation.zh: 但我不知道我应该做些什么

translation.en: so I'm just gonna be lazy and do nothing."
translation.zh: 所以就懒懒散散 什么也不做”

translation.en: Then, from that, obviously comes the depression.
translation.zh: 接着抑郁症自然就找上门来了

translation.en: There's something that… that will apply to you
translation.zh: 这一工具适用于你

translation.en: and to anybody else who doesn't have a sense of direction or doesn't know what they should do next,
translation.zh: 以及所有失去方向或者不知道下一步该怎么走的人

translation.en: and the answer is, you can always work on your life force.
translation.zh: 那就是提升自己的生命力

translation.en: The only way to find out what you should be doing, like who you are,
translation.zh: 要想知道自己该做些什么要想认清自己 只有一个方法

translation.en: is to activate your life force,
translation.zh: 那就是激活你的生命力

translation.en: because your life force is the only part of you
translation.zh: 因为当你迷失方向的时候

translation.en: that actually is capable of guiding you when you're lost.
translation.zh: 只有你的生命力能够引导你

translation.en: If you think of it as a pyramid, there's three levels of the life force.
translation.zh: 如果把它想象成一个金字塔生命力可分为三个层次

translation.en: The bottom level is your relationship with your physical body.
translation.zh: 最底层是你与你的身体的关系

translation.en: The second layer is your relationship with other people.
translation.zh: （人际）

translation.en: And the highest level is your relationship with yourself.
translation.zh: 最顶层是你与自己的关系

translation.en: The bottom step is your relationship to your physical body.
translation.zh: 底层代表的是你与你的身体的关系

translation.en: All you gotta do is get your body working better, and it always works.
translation.zh: 你需要做的就是让身体更好地运作这是肯定有效的

translation.en: The most classic thing is they're not exercising.
translation.zh: 最常见的情况就是缺乏运动

translation.en: Diet is another one,
translation.zh: 另一个是饮食习惯

translation.en: and sleeping.
translation.zh: 还有睡眠

translation.en: So what percentage of that stuff
translation.zh: 在能使自己精神状况好转的因素中

translation.en: is what makes you actually feel better at first?
translation.zh: 改善身体健康占多少比例？

translation.en: Well, when it starts out,
translation.zh: 刚开始的时候

translation.en: it's probably 85%.
translation.zh: 大概85%

translation.en: It's very high.
translation.zh: 非常高

translation.en: [Jonah] How fucking crazy is that?
translation.zh: 太他妈夸张了

translation.en: When I was a kid,
translation.zh: 我小的时候

translation.en: exercise and diet was framed to me in like,
translation.zh: 运动和饮食这两个词对我来说

translation.en: "There's something wrong with how you look."
translation.zh: 就像是暗示我身材有问题一样

translation.en: But never once was exercise or diet
translation.zh: 从来没有人从心理健康的角度

translation.en: propositioned to me in terms of mental health.
translation.zh: 向我提出过多运动或注意饮食的建议

translation.en: I just wish that was presented to people differently.
translation.zh: 我只是希望人们没被灌输这样的概念

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: [Jonah] Because, for me, that caused a lot of problems
translation.zh: 因为这给我造成了很多问题

translation.en: and even problems with me and my mom.
translation.zh: 甚至影响了我和妈妈的关系

translation.en: I really met her, like, with an attitude of,
translation.zh: 她的建议激起了我的强烈反抗

translation.en: "Fuck you, I don't want to do that, because you're saying there's something wrong with me."
translation.zh: “去你的 我才不要你这是在说我有问题”

translation.en: Yeah? Explain that.
translation.zh: 嗯？解释一下

translation.en: Um, I can, but I'm not gonna go into it, 'cause this movie is about you, not me.
translation.zh: 我可以解释 但我不想详说因为这部电影的主角是你 不是我

translation.en: But what if I said the more you elaborate on it,
translation.zh: 但如果我说 你说得越详细

translation.en: the easier it's gonna be for me to take some chances.
translation.zh: 我就越容易找到症结所在呢？

translation.en: Did you ever think of it like that?
translation.zh: 你有没有这样想过？

translation.en: I would say you should make a movie about me,
translation.zh: 我会说你应该拍一部关于我的电影

translation.en: instead of me making a movie about you.
translation.zh: 而不是让我拍一部关于你的电影

translation.en: Yeah, that's a good one.
translation.zh: 说得好

translation.en: Okay. So that's the first level.
translation.zh: 好 所以这就是第一层

translation.en: The next one is your relationship to other people,
translation.zh: 下一层是你与其他人的关系

translation.en: 'cause when people get depressed, it's not that they end their relationships.
translation.zh: 当人们抑郁的时候其实并不会终止自己的人际关系

translation.en: It's like a ship disappearing over the horizon.
translation.zh: 只是像一艘消失在地平线上的船一样

translation.en: They start to get pulled back, away from their life,
translation.zh: 他们开始脱离生活

translation.en: and relationships are like--
translation.zh: 而人际关系就像…

translation.en: You know those things when you're climbing a mountain, pounding those pitons,
translation.zh: 你知道攀岩时用的岩钉吧？

translation.en: it's like a handhold.
translation.zh: 它们就像把手

translation.en: So your relationships are like handholds to let yourself get pulled back into life.
translation.zh: 你的人际关系就像把手帮助你把自己重新拉回到生活中

translation.en: The key of it is you have to take the initiative.
translation.zh: 关键是你必须采取主动

translation.en: If you're waiting for them to the take the initiative, you don't understand.
translation.zh: 如果你静等对方主动那你就不明白这其中的道理

translation.en: You could invite somebody out to lunch that you don't find interesting,
translation.zh: 你可以邀请某人一起吃午饭就算你觉得他无聊也没关系

translation.en: it doesn't matter, it will affect you anyway, in a positive way.
translation.zh: 你可以邀请某人一起吃午饭就算你觉得他无聊也没关系 不管怎样 都会给你带来积极的影响

translation.en: That person represents the whole human race, symbolically.
translation.zh: 从象征意义上说那个人代表了整个人类

translation.en: So that's the middle tier, and the highest tier is your relationship with yourself.
translation.zh: 所以这就是中间层最顶层代表的是你与你自己的关系

translation.en: The best way to say it is to get yourself in a relationship with your unconscious,
translation.zh: 最好的解释是你必须与自己的潜意识建立关系

translation.en: because nobody knows what's in their unconscious unless they activate it.
translation.zh: 因为要想知道自己的潜意识里有什么就得先把它激活

translation.en: And one trick about this is writing.
translation.zh: 关于这点有个诀窍 那就是写作

translation.en: It's really a magical thing.
translation.zh: 这是非常神奇的一件事

translation.en: You enhance your relationship with yourself by writing.
translation.zh: 写作能让你增进与自己的关系

translation.en: Some people say, "Well, write what?"
translation.zh: 有些人会说 “写什么？我不感兴趣 我又不是作家”

translation.en: "I'm not interesting. I'm not a writer." It doesn't matter.
translation.zh: “写什么？我不感兴趣 我又不是作家” 这都无所谓

translation.en: If you start to write, the writing is like a mirror.
translation.zh: 当你开始写作你的文字就像一面镜子

translation.en: It reflects what's going on in your unconscious,
translation.zh: 它反映了你无意识里正在发生的事情

translation.en: and things will come out if you write in journal form
translation.zh: 如果你以日志的形式写作 那些你不知道自己知道的事全都会一一浮现

translation.en: that you didn't know that you knew.
translation.zh: 那些你不知道自己知道的事全都会一一浮现

translation.en: These are the three levels of the life force.
translation.zh: 这就是生命力的三个层次

translation.en: If you're lost, don't try to figure it out.
translation.zh: 如果你迷失了方向不要试图去弄明白

translation.en: Let it go and work on your life force first.
translation.zh: 随它去 先在你的生命力上下功夫

translation.en: It's about passion.
translation.zh: 这关乎热忱

translation.en: Increasing your life force
translation.zh: 提升你的生命力

translation.en: so you can find out what you're really passionate about.
translation.zh: 这样你就能找到你真正的热忱所在

translation.en: But step one is to be passionate about connecting to your own life force,
translation.zh: 但第一步是要热衷于与自己的生命力建立联系

translation.en: and anybody can do that.
translation.zh: 这是人人都能做到的

translation.en: [Jonah] If I just do that pyramid, everything else seems to fall into place?
translation.zh: 只要搞定了金字塔其他一切似乎就会水到渠成

translation.en: It will. Everything else will fall in place.
translation.zh: 对 其他一切自会水到渠成

translation.en: [Jonah] So how do you come up with this stuff?
translation.zh: 这些你都是怎么想出来的？

translation.en: Well, I once had a supervisor-- I was very young.
translation.zh: 我以前有位导师 那时候我还很年轻

translation.en: I didn't even have my own practice yet.
translation.zh: 甚至都还没开设自己的诊所

translation.en: I'm talking to people about what happened 30 years ago in their life
translation.zh: 当时我会跟病人聊他们30年前经历过的事

translation.en: or what was the cause of their problem.
translation.zh: 或者他们的问题的根源

translation.en: They would walk out the same way they walked in,
translation.zh: 可他们走的时候跟进来的时候一样

translation.en: feeling like shit and basically hopeless.
translation.zh: 感觉糟糕透顶 绝望不已

translation.en: So I said to him,
translation.zh: 所以我就跟导师说

translation.en: "Is there anything we can do so that they can feel better,
translation.zh: “我们能做些什么让他们尽快感觉好一点吗？

translation.en: feel something at least, sooner?"
translation.zh: 至少感觉到点什么？”

translation.en: And the guy… [chuckles] The guy says to me,
translation.zh: 那个家伙却跟我说

translation.en: "Don't you dare," he says.
translation.zh: “你想都别想”

translation.en: It was like somebody who fundamentally didn't understand the human condition.
translation.zh: 这个人似乎根本就不了解人的境况

translation.en: I said, "Wait, we have to do something right at the moment."
translation.zh: 我说“等等我们必须在当下那一刻做点什么”

translation.en: It doesn't have to solve all their problems,
translation.zh: 不一定要解决他们所有的问题

translation.en: but you have to give somebody the feeling that they can change right now.
translation.zh: 但必须让他们感觉到他们此时此刻就可以改变

translation.en: I didn't want people walking out of my office with nothing.
translation.zh: 我不希望病人一无所获地走出我的办公室

translation.en: Did you ever worry, with that strategy, you'd give them the wrong piece of action?
translation.zh: 你是否担心过这种策略会让他们采取错误的行动？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: In this area, as I always say,
translation.zh: 在这个领域 正如我常说的

translation.en: I'm just a regular person, nothing unusual, except for this.
translation.zh: 我只是个普通人 没什么特别的除了这一点

translation.en: I zoom in on you, and I block out everything else.
translation.zh: 我能把焦点对准你然后把其他一切都屏蔽掉

translation.en: Since I was a little kid, people have always walked up to me
translation.zh: 打从小时候起人们就经常主动找我倾诉

translation.en: and told me their problems. A little kid.
translation.zh: 打从小时候起人们就经常主动找我倾诉 我一个十岁小毛头成年人却过来找我倾诉

translation.en: I would be ten years old, and a grown man would come up to me.
translation.zh: 我一个十岁小毛头成年人却过来找我倾诉

translation.en: Most of them I didn't even know. They're just pouring their hearts out.
translation.zh: 这些人大多数我甚至都不认识

translation.en: Who knows where that comes from.
translation.zh: 谁知道那是怎么回事

translation.en: I was in the Bronx till I was five. Then we moved down to Manhattan.
translation.zh: 我5岁前一直住在布朗克斯区后来我们搬到了曼哈顿

translation.en: [Jonah] Where in Manhattan?
translation.zh: 曼哈顿的哪里？

translation.en: The first place was 78th and Broadway. 215 West 78th Street.
translation.zh: 最初搬到百老汇大街西78街215号

translation.en: It was regular, middle-class, working people.
translation.zh: 都是些中产阶级、辛勤工作的普通人

translation.en: My father was a very nice guy.
translation.zh: 我爸爸是个好男人

translation.en: He was loud, opinionated.
translation.zh: 他性格直爽 有主见

translation.en: He loved to entertain.
translation.zh: 他热爱交际

translation.en: If it was up to him, he would have people over to the house every single night,
translation.zh: 要是他说了算他每天晚上都会请人到家里做客

translation.en: and she hated it.
translation.zh: 我妈妈讨厌这样

translation.en: My mother told me, she said, on a beautiful sunny day in the Bronx,
translation.zh: 妈妈告诉我在布朗克斯区一个阳光明媚的下午

translation.en: a trillion kids out playing in the streets,
translation.zh: 一大群孩子正在街上玩耍

translation.en: she told me her favorite thing was to stay indoors and read a book.
translation.zh: 而她最喜欢做的事就是呆在屋里看书

translation.en: Her thing was, "Stay off my case. Stay away from me."
translation.zh: 她的想法是“别来烦我 离我远一点

translation.en: "I want to get lost in this book because life is too painful."
translation.zh: 我想迷失在这本书里因为生活太痛苦了

translation.en: "I don't wanna deal with life. I wanna deal with this book."
translation.zh: 我不想面对生活 我只想面对这本书”

translation.en: So you can see these two people, there was big problems.
translation.zh: 可想而知这两人之间存在着很大的问题

translation.en: [Jonah] What time period? The '50s?
translation.zh: 那是什么时候？是1950年代吗？

translation.en: Yeah. That was, like, uh… '56. It's probably…
translation.zh: 对 应该是1956年

translation.en: Let's see, he-- When did he die?
translation.zh: 我想想 他哪年去世的来着？

translation.en: [Jonah] What was your brother's name who passed away?
translation.zh: 你已经去世的弟弟叫什么名字？

translation.en: [Stutz] His name was Eddie. The one that died, yeah.
translation.zh: 已经去世的那个弟弟叫埃迪

translation.en: They knew immediately.
translation.zh: 他们一眼就看出来了

translation.en: It was a certain kind of tumor that has a certain kind of rash, I think.
translation.zh: 那种肿瘤好像会伴随着某种特定的皮疹

translation.en: The doctor, he told me years later,
translation.zh: 那位医生多年后告诉我

translation.en: he said he knew the moment he walked into the room what it was.
translation.zh: 他一走进房间就知道那是什么了

translation.en: But my parents didn't tell us. It was a mistake.
translation.zh: 但我爸妈没告诉我们 那是个错误

translation.en: [Jonah] How old are you when he dies? You're nine?
translation.zh: 他去世的时候你几岁？九岁吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I was nine. Yeah.
translation.zh: 对 当时我九岁

translation.en: [Jonah] And he was three?
translation.zh: 当时他三岁？

translation.en: He was three, yeah.
translation.zh: 对 当时他三岁

translation.en: I would go into the bathroom.
translation.zh: 我记得我会走进浴室里

translation.en: I remember, I'd put one foot up on the toilet bowl,
translation.zh: 我记得我会走进浴室里 把一只脚放在马桶上

translation.en: like I was some kind of a medieval knight or something,
translation.zh: 就好像自己是个中世纪骑士或什么的

translation.en: and I talked to God, and I said to God,
translation.zh: 然后我会跟上帝说话 我对上帝说

translation.en: "If you let him live, I will believe in you."
translation.zh: “如果你让他活下去 我就信奉你

translation.en: "If you don't, I won't." Obviously, I had to overcome that.
translation.zh: 否则就不信奉你” 显然这是我需要克服的心理障碍

translation.en: Any time I'm in New York, I try to go past that building.
translation.zh: 每次来到纽约我都会特意经过那座大楼

translation.en: I like to stand in the spot where we were standing when my father came up to us.
translation.zh: 我喜欢站在那天爸爸朝我们走来时我们所站的位置

translation.en: My mother gets out of the cab
translation.zh: 我妈妈从出租车上下来

translation.en: and just walks right into the building and takes the elevator upstairs.
translation.zh: 径直走进大楼 乘电梯上楼

translation.en: She didn't even look at us.
translation.zh: 连看都没看我们一眼

translation.en: Seriously, I asked my mother, "Can I go back to school?"
translation.zh: 我上楼问妈妈“我能回学校去吗？”

translation.en: And she said, "Yeah, you can do anything you want."
translation.zh: 她说“行 你想做什么都行”

translation.en: And I did.
translation.zh: 于是我回去了

translation.en: And I think that was part of my denial.
translation.zh: 我觉得当时我是在逃避现实

translation.en: Everybody was moving quickly to deny what was happening.
translation.zh: 所有人都在快速前进想逃避正在发生的事

translation.en: Everybody was avidly not accepting what was going on.
translation.zh: 所有人都热切地不接受正在发生的事

translation.en: That was Part X. Part X was in my mind
translation.zh: 那是第X部分 在我理解这一切之前我脑子里就存在着第X部分

translation.en: before I understood any of this.
translation.zh: 在我理解这一切之前我脑子里就存在着第X部分

translation.en: [Jonah] Part X is such a major part of understanding how your tools work,
translation.zh: 第X部分是了解你的工具如何运作的关键

translation.en: so I wanted to talk about that.
translation.zh: 所以我想聊聊它

translation.en: So, when adversity comes,
translation.zh: 当逆境来临时

translation.en: it's an opportunity for you to--
translation.zh: 这对你来说是一个机会

translation.en: At that moment, you're gonna face Part X directly.
translation.zh: 在那一刻 你将直接面对第X部分

translation.en: Part X is the judgmental part of you,
translation.zh: 第X部分是爱评判别人的你

translation.en: the antisocial part of you.
translation.zh: 是社恐的你

translation.en: It's an invisible… force
translation.zh: 它是一种无形的力量

translation.en: that wants to keep you from changing or growing.
translation.zh: 它想阻止你改变或成长

translation.en: It wants to block your evolution.
translation.zh: 它想阻止你进化

translation.en: It wants to block your potential.
translation.zh: 它想阻止你充分发挥潜力

translation.en: It wants to fuck up your shit.
translation.zh: 它想搞砸你的人生

translation.en: So Part X would be the villain
translation.zh: 所以在做人的故事里

translation.en: in the story of being a person.
translation.zh: 第X部分就是反派

translation.en: The tools are what the hero on the journey can use to fight the villain.
translation.zh: 而工具是这场旅程中的英雄可以用来对抗反派的东西

translation.en: Yes. Part X is the voice of impossibility.
translation.zh: 对 第X部分是不可能之声

translation.en: Whatever it is you think you need to do, it's gonna tell you that's impossible.
translation.zh: 因为不管你觉得你需要做什么它都会告诉你是不可能的

translation.en: "Give up."
translation.zh: “放弃吧”

translation.en: It gives you a very specific dossier about who you are, what you're capable of.
translation.zh: 它给你造了一份非常具体的档案告诉你你是谁 你有什么能力

translation.en: And it creates this, like, primal fear in human beings.
translation.zh: 而这激起了人类心中最原始的恐惧

translation.en: What does your Part X say to you?
translation.zh: 你的第X部分对你说了什么？

translation.en: It makes me feel like I'm wasting time.
translation.zh: 它让我觉得我在浪费时间

translation.en: It tells me I've invented all this stuff,
translation.zh: 它告诉我 我发明了这些东西

translation.en: and the stuff is great, I'm very confident, but it'll never--
translation.zh: 这些东西很棒 我非常有信心但它们永远不会…

translation.en: It won't spread deeply enough into the culture.
translation.zh: 它们不会深入地渗透到我们的文化中

translation.en: [Jonah] So how can people get rid of Part X?
translation.zh: 那么人们如何才能摆脱第X部分呢？

translation.en: You can't.
translation.zh: 摆脱不了

translation.en: You can defeat him temporarily, but he's always gonna keep coming back.
translation.zh: 你能暂时打败它 但它总会卷土重来

translation.en: That's why you have three aspects of reality that nobody gets to avoid.
translation.zh: 这就是为什么现实有三个要素是没人能逃避得了的

translation.en: Pain, uncertainty,
translation.zh: 痛苦、不确定性

translation.en: and constant work.
translation.zh: 以及不间断的努力

translation.en: So those are things you're just gonna have to live with, no matter what.
translation.zh: 所以这些是你无论如何都得忍受的

translation.en: If it did work like that, if you could banish Part X,
translation.zh: 如果真像你说的那样如果你能除掉第X部分

translation.en: then there'd be no further progress.
translation.zh: 那么就不会有进一步的进展了

translation.en: So if this is a story, the main character needs Part X, needs the villain,
translation.zh: 所以如果这是个故事主角需要第X部分 他需要反派

translation.en: because if the main character doesn't have to overcome a villain,
translation.zh: 因为如果主角不需要战胜反派

translation.en: there's no story.
translation.zh: -就没有故事了-对

translation.en: -[Stutz] Right. -There's no growth. There's no change. There's no bravery. There's no courageousness.
translation.zh: 没有成长 没有改变没有勇敢 没有无畏

translation.en: We need the negativity of Part X, or else we don't grow.
translation.zh: 我们需要第X部分的消极性否则我们不会成长

translation.en: [Stutz] Yeah, that's correct.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: It doesn't mean you can't, um, work very hard at a goal. It doesn't mean you can't succeed.
translation.zh: 并不是说你无法为目标努力奋斗并不是说你无法成功

translation.en: But if you wanna be happy-- 'Cause that won't make you happy.
translation.zh: 但如果你想要快乐这些都不会让你快乐

translation.en: What will make you happy is the process.
translation.zh: 会让你快乐的是那个过程

translation.en: You have to learn how to love the process of dealing with those three things.
translation.zh: 你必须学着去爱上应对这三样东西的过程

translation.en: That's where the tools come in.
translation.zh: 这时候工具就能派上用场

translation.en: When it appears, you can identify it,
translation.zh: 当它们出现的时候 你能识别出来

translation.en: and then, you can use a tool on it to nullify it.
translation.zh: 然后用工具去抵消它们 （痛苦 不确定性 努力 工具）

translation.en: If you can teach someone to do that, they can change their whole life.
translation.zh: 要是你能教会一个人这么做这些工具就能改变他的一生

translation.en: Because the highest creative expression for a human being
translation.zh: 因为对人类来说 最高的创造性表达

translation.en: is to be able to create something new right in the face of adversity,
translation.zh: 是能够在逆境中创造新事物

translation.en: and the worse the adversity, the greater the opportunity.
translation.zh: 而逆境越大 机会就越大

translation.en: Finding out that he'd died was like… It was like discovering a new world.
translation.zh: 得知他死了就好像发现了一个新的世界一样

translation.en: And I said, "Wow, that could happen to me? I'm just a kid."
translation.zh: 我心想“我只是个小孩这种事竟然会发生在我身上”

translation.en: That was one of the biggest effects it had on me,
translation.zh: 这是他的死对我最大的影响

translation.en: besides the fact that my parents collapsed.
translation.zh: 除了我爸妈彻底崩溃这一事实

translation.en: They couldn't quite function as parents emotionally.
translation.zh: 他们在情感上无法完全发挥父母的作用

translation.en: They just couldn't do it.
translation.zh: 他们就是做不到

translation.en: [Jonah] Do you…
translation.zh: 你是否…

translation.en: Can you blame them?
translation.zh: 你能怪他们吗？

translation.en: No, I've never blamed them for that.
translation.zh: 我从没为此责怪过他们

translation.en: Thank God.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: It changed my whole life, because everything had a double meaning.
translation.zh: 我的人生彻底地改变了因为一切都变成了有双重意义

translation.en: If I'd go to play softball or something and I had a time to be back for dinner,
translation.zh: 如果我去打垒球或什么的然后到点回家吃饭了

translation.en: if I was like--
translation.zh: 我只要…

translation.en: I swear, if I was one minute late, they would just go nuts.
translation.zh: 我发誓 我只要迟到一分钟我爸妈就会发狂

translation.en: Childhood was over.
translation.zh: 童年结束了

translation.en: Everything was serious. You didn't want to fuck it up.
translation.zh: 一切都变得认真严肃你不敢搞砸任何事

translation.en: His death became this giant weight that I had to carry around,
translation.zh: 他的死成了我必须背负的巨大负担

translation.en: but nobody would admit the fucking weight was there.
translation.zh: 但没人愿意承认这该死的负担的存在

translation.en: I'll never forget this. A friend of mine, he was badly hurt.
translation.zh: 我永远不会忘记这事 我有个朋友 他受了重伤

translation.en: I went with my father to visit him in the hospital,
translation.zh: 所以我和爸爸一起去医院看望他

translation.en: and on the way out, my father turns around, and he says,
translation.zh: 走的时候 爸爸转过身来对我说

translation.en: "That's the only profession."
translation.zh: “那是唯一的职业”

translation.en: Meaning, "If you do anything else but become a doctor,
translation.zh: 意思是“如果你从事除了医生以外的职业

translation.en: you're persona non grata over here."
translation.zh: 我们这里不欢迎你”

translation.en: "I love you, but if you don't become a doctor, I'll never respect you."
translation.zh: “我爱你 但如果你不成为一名医生我永远不会尊重你”

translation.en: He and my mother were both atheists, so they had nothing to fall back on.
translation.zh: 他和我妈妈都是无神论者所以他们没什么可以依靠的

translation.en: It was a fight against death, and if I didn't join the fight,
translation.zh: 那是一场与死亡的战斗如果我不加入这场战斗

translation.en: the whole family was gonna fall apart.
translation.zh: 整个家庭就会分崩离析

translation.en: Right, so you had a responsibility to satiate their nerves and anxiety.
translation.zh: 所以你有责任去缓解他们的紧张和焦虑

translation.en: You became their therapist.
translation.zh: 你成了他们的医师

translation.en: That's right. That's exactly right.
translation.zh: 是的 完全正确

translation.en: So they had nothing in terms of, uh…
translation.zh: 所以他们没有任何

translation.en: [Jonah] Faith?
translation.zh: 信仰？

translation.en: Yeah, in terms of that would support them in having any faith.
translation.zh: 对 他们找不到理由去拥抱任何信仰

translation.en: They only had one thing that could lead to faith,
translation.zh: 只有一样东西能带他们走向信仰

translation.en: and that was me.
translation.zh: 那就是我

translation.en: You see how these things get passed down.
translation.zh: 你能看到这些问题是如何被遗传下去的

translation.en: And I… I tried my best.
translation.zh: 我已经尽力了

translation.en: Total failure, obviously. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 显然彻底失败了

translation.en: I… I… I guess I did do one thing.
translation.zh: 但我确实做到了一件事

translation.en: I became a doctor.
translation.zh: 我成为了一名医生

translation.en: So, um…
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: So at least maybe something constructive came out of it.
translation.zh: 也许不完全是徒劳无益的

translation.en: Beginning to see patients was like a joke for me.
translation.zh: 开始接诊对我来说简直像个笑话

translation.en: It was just a change of venue. I had done it so much.
translation.zh: 不就是换了个场地而已我一直以来都在这么做

translation.en: And I wasn't bad at it, even when I was 12.
translation.zh: 而且做得还不错即使在我只有12岁的时候

translation.en: [Stutz] Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: Hey, are we gonna continue these sessions a few times a week where I'm the patient? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们是要继续这样每周做几次治疗但由我来当病人吗？

translation.en: It'd be nice if you answered more of these questions.

translation.zh: 我就跟我爸爸在聊这些 然后他说

translation.zh: 太阳怎么可能还在上面？

translation.zh: 我还记得太阳冲破云层的那一刻

translation.zh: 我还记得太阳冲破云层的那一刻 我感到惊叹不已

translation.zh: 去判断现实的本质

translation.zh: 太阳总是在那里

translation.zh: 而云总是在这里 挡住了太阳

translation.zh: 如果你无法突破你就会觉得那是很糟糕的一天

translation.zh: 你的每一个念头都会影响你的心情

translation.zh: 你的念头要么是积极的要么是消极的

translation.zh: 感恩之流要你选择积极的念头

translation.zh: 第X部分要你选择消极的念头

translation.zh: 所以它就在天上制造一些乌云让你看不见太阳

translation.zh: 让你忘记天上实际上是阳光明媚的

translation.en: The question becomes, "How do you penetrate the cloud?"
translation.zh: 所以问题是 你该如何突破云层？

translation.en: And the answer is, "With gratefulness."
translation.zh: 答案是感恩之情

translation.en: It gives you the sensation, the feeling,
translation.zh: 它给你的感觉是

translation.en: that there's always something up there positive even if you can't see it at all.
translation.zh: 那里总是有一些积极的东西即使你完全看不见

translation.en: But you have to have a mechanism. That's where the tool comes in.
translation.zh: 但你需要一种机制这时工具就派上用场了

translation.en: The Grateful Flow is not the things you're grateful for.
translation.zh: 感恩之流不是你感恩的东西

translation.en: The Grateful Flow is the process of creating these things.
translation.zh: 感恩之流是创造这些东西的过程

translation.en: So close your eyes.
translation.zh: 闭上眼睛

translation.en: Now, what you want to do is you say two or three, at most four,
translation.zh: 现在我要你说出两个或三个最多四个

translation.en: things you're grateful for.
translation.zh: 你感恩的东西

translation.en: The smaller the thing, the better,
translation.zh: 这东西越小越好

translation.en: because it forces you to concentrate gratefulness.
translation.zh: 因为它迫使你集中感恩之情

translation.en: You wanna do it nice and slow. You want to feel the gratefulness.
translation.zh: 慢慢来 好好去感受那股感恩之情

translation.en: I'm grateful for my nephews.
translation.zh: 我感恩有我的侄子们

translation.en: I'm grateful for surfing.
translation.zh: 我感恩有冲浪

translation.en: I'm grateful…
translation.zh: 我感恩…

translation.en: for my dog.
translation.zh: 有我的狗

translation.en: I'm grateful for you.
translation.zh: 我感恩有你

translation.en: [Stutz] Okay, now, keep naming things, but don't say them out loud.
translation.zh: 好 继续罗列 但不要大声说出来

translation.en: Just keep creating that stream of gratefulness.
translation.zh: 继续创造源源不断的感恩之情

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: The next thing you do is you feel
translation.zh: 接下来你要感觉自己即将产生另一个感恩的念头

translation.zh: 接下来你要感觉自己即将产生另一个感恩的念头 但你把这个念头打住

translation.en: You block it. So all you feel is the force that would create a grateful thought,
translation.zh: 但你把这个念头打住 所以你所感觉到的只是这股产生感恩念头的力量

translation.en: and as it gets stronger and stronger, you feel taken over by it.
translation.zh: 随着它变得越来越强大你感觉自己被它征服

translation.en: That's the Grateful Flow. That was excellent. Did you feel anything?
translation.zh: 这就是感恩之流 做得很棒 有什么感觉吗？

translation.en: I felt everything kind of just… slow down.
translation.zh: 我觉得一切都 慢了下来

translation.en: And I felt a warmth.
translation.zh: 我感觉到一股温暖

translation.en: -[Stutz] Mm-hmm. -Like in a sense of comfort.
translation.zh: 一种安逸感

translation.en: [Stutz] That's pretty good.
translation.zh: 不错

translation.en: The key is not saying the same things over and over that you're grateful for.
translation.zh: 关键是不要重复着说同样的东西

translation.en: You wanna make it a creative act.
translation.zh: 它必须是个具有创造性的行为

translation.en: When you have to dig and work on it to find these things,
translation.zh: 当你不得不去挖掘和努力寻找这些东西时

translation.en: that process itself will change your mood.
translation.zh: 那个过程本身就会改变你的心情

translation.en: The classic time to use it is when your thoughts are out of control.
translation.zh: 最经典的用法就是在你思绪失去控制的时候

translation.en: The worst thing to do is argue with them.
translation.zh: 你最不该做的就是与它们争论

translation.en: 'Cause its effect on you is terrible, and it does nothing for you.
translation.zh: 那只会给你带来恶劣的影响 而且对你没有任何帮助

translation.en: But gratefulness is not just, "I'm lucky somebody helped me," or whatever.
translation.zh: 但感恩不仅仅是“我很庆幸有人帮了我”

translation.en: Gratefulness is the state you want to be in
translation.zh: 感恩是你想尽可能经常处于的状态

translation.en: as often as you possibly can be in it, because it's the state that connects you…
translation.zh: 感恩是你想尽可能经常处于的状态 因为这种状态能带你突破云层

translation.en: It's the state that breaks through the cloud.
translation.zh: 因为这种状态能带你突破云层

translation.en: And once you're up there, you're in a different world.
translation.zh: 一旦突破了你就进入了一个不同的世界

translation.zh: 你是受害者 你得到的不够多

translation.zh: 你为什么要为你所拥有的而感恩？”

translation.zh: 那是魔鬼在说话那就是典型的第X部分

translation.zh: 我很少和你谈起你的帕金森病

translation.zh: 我不知道其中有哪一部分是因为

translation.zh: 我不想承认自己对这件事的恐惧

translation.zh: 嗯 我会给你的建议是 假设你自己低估了我

translation.zh: 因为我每天都在继续做调整

translation.zh: 而且很多调整都非常有帮助

translation.zh: 不知道啦 我是搞笑派的嘛

translation.zh: 这不是我经常会去想的事

translation.zh: 我会去想未来

translation.zh: 但我最大的恐惧是没能在我死前做完我要做的事

translation.zh: 因为我有好多事要做我们在这里谈到的东西

translation.zh: 因为我有好多事要做我们在这里谈到的东西 可能只是其中的10%

translation.zh: 只是一小部分 对

translation.zh: 我觉得死亡本身对每个人来说

translation.zh: 都是个复杂的话题

translation.zh: 对我来说

translation.zh: 我特别害怕失去你

translation.zh: 并不是说我一直都在想这件事

translation.zh: 但你是我去寻求人生建议的人

translation.zh: 你带给我安慰让我知道人生总会有出路

translation.zh: 同时

translation.zh: 我唯一一次经历沉痛的死别时

translation.zh: 也是你帮我渡过了难关

translation.zh: 你是说你哥哥？ 对

translation.zh: 几年前他意外去世

translation.zh: 在我拍这部电影之前我并不知道你弟弟已经去世了

translation.zh: 你讲了那个故事 说你那天在哪里

translation.zh: -对-你那天所站的位置

translation.zh: 你那天去了学校等等

translation.zh: 我一直在逃避 不愿去想那一天

translation.zh: 那天早上我去了你的办公室

translation.zh: 那绝对是我一生中最难熬的一天

translation.zh: 绝对是我这辈子最崩溃的一刻

translation.zh: 我记得的一件事是那天你跟我要了手机

translation.en: and you took a picture of me.
translation.zh: 然后给我拍了一张照片

translation.en: And I, like, wondered why you did that?
translation.zh: 我想知道你为什么这么做

translation.en: It is very rare in life that you get a chance to record something
translation.zh: 能有机会把人生中最重要的时刻记录下来

translation.en: at the climactic, you know, most important moment.
translation.zh: 能有机会把人生中最重要的时刻记录下来 这是非常难得的

translation.en: And then you come back to it.
translation.zh: 之后再回过头来看它

translation.en: Whether it's in a week or a year, it doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 不管是一星期后还是一年后都无所谓

translation.en: You… you have, um, a… There's a time gap.
translation.zh: 中间隔上一段时间

translation.en: And in that time gap,
translation.zh: 在这段时间里

translation.en: you actually experience the forces of healing, of recovery.
translation.zh: 你能真正体验到疗愈的力量

translation.zh: 我已经四年没看过这张照片了

translation.zh: 但我把它打印了出来因为我想给你看 自己也看一下

translation.zh: -你已经四年没看过了？-对

translation.zh: 从好的方面来说

translation.zh: 我看起来像被剥去了虚假的一切

translation.en: And there is an oddly serene look on my face.
translation.zh: -我的神情异常宁静-对

translation.en: -[Stutz] There is. -Which is, like, so bizarre.
translation.zh: 真的好怪

translation.en: But maybe because it, like, demolished…
translation.zh: 但也许是因为它摧毁了

translation.zh: 一切不重要的东西

translation.zh: 它摧毁了你以为自己需要但其实并不需要的一切

translation.zh: 照片里的那个人走了一趟地狱

translation.en: and came out the other side and is really okay,
translation.zh: 并且回来了 而且也好好的

translation.en: in a very nondramatic way, which I like.
translation.zh: 过程平淡无奇 但我很喜欢

translation.zh: 尽管可能看起来不像这就是胜利的样子

translation.en: Loss Processing is a tool that allows you to process loss, right?
translation.zh: 丧失处理是帮助你处理丧失的工具 对吧？

translation.en: And most people are very bad at it.
translation.zh: 大多数人在这方面都做得不好

translation.en: Not only are they bad when there's a loss and they get depressed or bereft,
translation.zh: 他们不仅在经历丧失时处理得不好因而感到抑郁或失落

translation.en: but before there's a loss, they're just worrying about a loss.
translation.zh: 而且在丧失还未发生前就一直担心它会发生

translation.en: The goal of this is to get what's called the potency of nonattachment.
translation.zh: 我们的目标是要获得所谓的不执着的效力

translation.en: That means I can pursue something, but I'm willing not to have it.
translation.zh: 这意味着我能去追求一样东西但我愿意不拥有它

translation.en: I still wanna pursue it. I want to pursue it really hard.
translation.zh: 我还是想追求它我想非常努力地追求它

translation.en: But I'm also willing to lose.
translation.zh: 但我也愿意失去它

translation.en: The first thing I want you to do is pick out something that you feel you've become too attached to.
translation.zh: 首先我要你挑出一样你觉得自己过于依恋的东西

translation.en: It could be a person, a job, something small. It doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 可以是一个人 一份工作一个小东西 都无所谓

translation.en: But something where you're loath to let go of it.
translation.zh: 总之是一个你不愿意放手的东西

translation.en: You're afraid, if you let go of it, something terrible's gonna happen.
translation.zh: 你害怕如果你放开它可怕的事情就会发生

translation.en: -You have it? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 想到了吗？

translation.en: [Stutz] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Now imagine you're grasping this thing.
translation.zh: 现在想象你在抓住这个东西

translation.en: And if it's not a material thing, it doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 如果它不是物质的东西也无所谓

translation.en: Just imagine you're grasping it,
translation.zh: 只要想象你在抓住它

translation.en: like you're grasping onto a branch on a tree.
translation.zh: 就像抓住树上的树枝一样

translation.en: It's scary. You're afraid to let go.
translation.zh: 很可怕 你不敢放手

translation.en: But you let go anyway.
translation.zh: 但你还是放手了

translation.en: And when you let go, you start to fall.
translation.zh: 当你放手时 你开始往下掉

translation.en: It's not a bad sensation though.
translation.zh: 但那并不是一种不好的感觉

translation.en: The falling is actually kind of slow and gentle, to your surprise,
translation.zh: 反而是出乎意料地缓慢而温柔

translation.en: but you're dropping down.
translation.zh: 你在往下掉

translation.en: And you say, "I'm willing to lose everything."
translation.zh: 你说“我愿意失去一切”

translation.en: And you have to say it silently,
translation.zh: 你必须默默地说

translation.en: but you want to really feel the, uh, intent behind that.
translation.zh: 你必须默默地说 你要真正感受到其背后的意图

translation.en: And the moment you say that,
translation.zh: 而在你说这句话的那一刻

translation.en: you hit the surface of a sun that was down there below you,
translation.zh: 你落在了位于下方的太阳表面上

translation.en: and your body burns up.
translation.zh: 整个身体燃烧了起来

translation.en: Now, at that point, you have lost everything,
translation.zh: 此刻 你已经失去了一切

translation.en: because the instrument of possession is your physical body.
translation.zh: 因为你的肉体是拥有事物的前提

translation.en: So if your physical body's burnt up, you're just one sunbeam
translation.zh: 如今你的肉体燃烧殆尽了

translation.en: amongst all these other sunbeams.
translation.zh: 你就变成了其中的一缕阳光

translation.en: You're radiating outward in all directions,
translation.zh: 你在向四面八方放射着光芒

translation.en: and what you're radiating is a very loving, giving, outflowing sensation.
translation.zh: 你放射的是一种非常有爱的给予的、流动的感觉

translation.en: And then you look around,
translation.zh: 然后你环顾四周

translation.en: and you see, all around you, an infinite number of other suns,
translation.zh: 你看到你周围有无限多的其他太阳

translation.en: just like the one you're inside of, all of which are radiating outwards.
translation.zh: 它们都在向外放射着光芒就像你掉进的那颗太阳一样

translation.en: And then you hear the suns, all of them, saying in unison,
translation.zh: 然后你听到所有的太阳齐声说

translation.en: "We are everywhere."
translation.zh: “我们无处不在”

translation.en: This world is called a sun world.
translation.zh: 这个世界被称为太阳世界

translation.en: All you can do is give. You can't take.
translation.zh: 你唯一能做的就是给予 你不能索取

translation.en: You can't grasp. You can't hold on to anything. It's just impossible.
translation.zh: 你不能抓住任何东西 这是不可能的

translation.en: Now you can open your eyes.
translation.zh: 可以睁开眼睛了

translation.en: How'd it feel?
translation.zh: 感觉如何？

translation.en: [Jonah] Great.
translation.zh: 很棒

translation.en: -You don't wanna say anything else? -Yeah, I do.
translation.zh: -没什么想说的吗？-有

translation.en: Which is, I'm very good at nonattachment
translation.zh: 不执着于工作、身份或与他人的过节

translation.en: to, like, a job or an identity or a beef with someone.
translation.zh: 不执着于工作、身份或与他人的过节 这方面我做得很好

translation.en: I can get there and use the tools to get there.
translation.zh: 我能用工具去实现这一点

translation.en: When it comes to things like a romantic relationship
translation.zh: 但当涉及到恋爱关系

translation.en: or a family member that I love,
translation.zh: 或者我所爱的家人之类的事情时

translation.en: the idea of losing those things,
translation.zh: 失去那些东西

translation.en: I struggle with that concept.
translation.zh: 是我难以接受的一个概念

translation.en: Think about it like this. You're not trying to become nonattached.
translation.zh: 这么说吧 不是要你变得毫无牵挂

translation.en: You're trying to move towards nonattachment
translation.zh: 而是要你在每次对丧失感到恐惧时

translation.en: every time you get scared of a loss.
translation.zh: 试着走向不执着

translation.en: For most people,
translation.zh: 对大多数人来说

translation.en: they've never been nonattached for one second in their whole life.
translation.zh: 他们一生中从未有过心无牵挂的时候

translation.en: So even the fact that they can move towards that is… is helpful for them.
translation.zh: 因此即使能朝着这个方向前进对他们也是有帮助的

translation.en: If you're human, it's not possible. It wouldn't even be good if you were totally nonattached.
translation.zh: 作为人类 完全无牵挂是不可能的也不是件好事

translation.en: That makes a lot of sense.
translation.zh: 这解释很有道理

translation.en: So the goal is not to become completely nonattached. No.
